CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: With deep understanding of efficient photoinduced electron transfer within an interpenetrating network by simple blending π-conjugated polymers ( electron donor ) with fullerene derivatives ( electron acceptor ) , 1 bulk - heterojunction ( BHJ ) polymer solar cells ( PSCs ) based on poly(3-hexylthiophene) ( P3HT ) : [6,6]-phenyl C 61 -butyric acid methyl ester ( PCBM ) have been extensively investigated , leading to great progress in power conversion efficiencies ( PCEs ) of 4-5 % .

Let's think step by step.

1. π-conjugated polymers (electron donor)
2. fullerene derivatives (electron acceptor)
3. polymer solar cells (PSCs)
4. poly(3-hexylthiophene) (P3HT)
5. [6,6]-phenyl C 61 -butyric acid methyl ester (PCBM)

These are the material names mentioned in the paragraph.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

1. π-conjugated polymers
2. fullerene derivatives
3. polymer solar cells (PSCs)
4. poly(3-hexylthiophene) (P3HT)
5. [6,6]-phenyl C 61 -butyric acid methyl ester (PCBM)

I have removed "electron donor" and "electron acceptor" as they are not material names but rather roles played by certain materials.

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| fullerene derivatives |
| polymer solar cells (PSCs) |

| [6,6]-phenyl C 61 -butyric acid methyl ester (PCBM) |
